casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Adam Robert JACKSON 397A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 7, 2016 Danielle Blass, Attorney at Law, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, for Jackson, Adam Robert. Joseph A. Newsome, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of November 2016 by Defendant for Removal of Current Appellate Counsel and Reappointment of the Office of the Appellate Defender:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of November 2016."
